ninja.leaping.configurate

Class Types

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.leaping.configurate.Types

  • public class Types
extends Object
    Contains functions useful for performing configuration type conversions. The naming scheme is as follows: as* functions attempt to convert the data passed to the appropriate type strictAs* functions will only return values if the input value is already of an appropriate type

      • asBoolean

        public static Boolean asBoolean(Object value)
        Tries to convert a value to a boolean. If value is a boolean, casts and returns If value is a Number, returns true if value is not 0 If value.toString() returns true, t, yes, y, or 1, returns true If value.toString() returns false, f, no, n, or 0, returns false Otherwise returns null
        Parameters:
        value - The value to convert
        Returns:
        Value converted following rules specified above:w

      • strictAsBoolean

        public static Boolean strictAsBoolean(Object value)
